trans-unit.source: Represents a column header in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un'intestazione di colonna in un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia esatta della cella.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il duplicato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto accessibile per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se non si chiama in modo esplicito il metodo CreateAccessibilityInstance, verrà chiamato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>riferimento alla proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Da ottenere o impostare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, è necessario aggiungere un riferimento di `Accessibility` assembly installato con .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il valore formattato della cella in cui copiare la <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, this method is called by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell.
trans-unit.target: In base al valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo, questo metodo viene chiamato per il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>metodo per recuperare un valore con formato degli Appunti che rappresenta la cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: I parametri correlati alla posizione di questo metodo indicano dove si trova la cella nella tabella di dati che rappresenta l'area definita dalle celle selezionate nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value.
trans-unit.target: A seconda della posizione della cella, le informazioni di formattazione possono essere restituite da questo metodo oltre il valore della cella.

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il formato HTML per una cella nella prima colonna di una riga includerà il tag che indica l'inizio di una riga.

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: I formati degli Appunti supportati includono <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero della riga contenente la cella.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che la cella è nella prima colonna dell'area definita dalle celle selezionate; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che la cella è l'ultima colonna dell'area definita dalle celle selezionate; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che la cella è nella prima riga dell'area definita dalle celle selezionate; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che la cella è nell'ultima riga dell'area definita dalle celle selezionate; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
trans-unit.target: La stringa di formato corrente della cella.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il valore della cella in cui copiare la <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnon è -1.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il rettangolo di delimitazione che racchiude l'area del contenuto della cella, che viene calcolato usando l'oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> stile di cella e oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The size of the cell's contents is computed dynamically when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo metodo viene chiamato, viene calcolata in modo dinamico le dimensioni del contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property is read.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato internamente quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>proprietà è di lettura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Contesto grafico per la cella.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> da applicare alla cella.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga padre della cella.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che delimita il contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnon è -1.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the inherited shortcut menu for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il menu di scelta rapida ereditato per la riga specificata.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: L'indice della riga di cui ottenere il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> di.

trans-unit.source: The index must be -1 to indicate the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: L'indice deve essere -1 per indicare la riga delle intestazioni di colonna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> of the column headers if one exists; otherwise, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> inherited from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> delle intestazioni di colonna, se presente; in caso contrario, il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> ereditato da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnon è -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stile applicato alla cella.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that inherits its settings from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>che eredita le impostazioni dagli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>oggetti restituiti dalle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> e</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [stili della cella nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be populated with the inherited cell style.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> da popolare con lo stile di cella ereditato.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga padre della cella.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include inherited colors in the returned cell style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per includere i colori ereditati nello stile di cella restituito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that includes the style settings of the cell inherited from the cell's parent row, column, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> che include le impostazioni di stile della cella ereditate dalla riga padre della cella, colonna e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnon è -1.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Calcola le dimensioni preferenziali, in pixel, della cella.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizzato per disegnare la cella.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> che rappresenta lo stile della cella.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indice di riga in base zero della cella.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Dimensione massima consentita della cella.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> che rappresenta le dimensioni preferenziali, in pixel, della cella.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnon è -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della cella.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga padre della cella.

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore contenuto nella <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnon è -1.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disegna l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usato per disegnare la cella.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta l'area della <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> che deve essere ridisegnata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> contenente i limiti della cella da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Indice di riga della cella da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valori che specifica lo stato della cella.

trans-unit.source: The data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: I dati della cella da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: I dati formattati della cella da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Un messaggio di errore associato alla cella.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> che contiene le informazioni di formattazione e stile relative alla cella.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> contenente gli stili del bordo per la cella da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valori che specifica quali parti della cella devono essere disegnate.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della cella.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga padre della cella.

trans-unit.source: The cell value to set.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della cella da impostare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value has been set; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il valore è stato impostato; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnon è -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which sort glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica l'icona di ordinamento viene visualizzato.

trans-unit.source: This property is set automatically for columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene impostata automaticamente per le colonne con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must set this property yourself when sorting by columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario impostare questa proprietà manualmente quando si ordinano le colonne con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> value representing the current glyph.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> che rappresenta l'icona corrente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore specificato durante l'impostazione di questa proprietà non è un valido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> valore.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OwningColumn*> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*> property of the cell is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta questa proprietà, il valore di <> </> *> proprietà o <> </> *> proprietà della cella è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- When changing the value of this property, the specified value is not <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*> property of the owning column is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - quando si modifica il valore di questa proprietà, il valore specificato non è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> e il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>proprietà della colonna di appartenenza è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la rappresentazione di stringa della cella.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta la cella corrente.
